DeploymentLog module¶

Simple text output to a log file about task performed and version information of application(s)

class DeploymentLog.DeploymentLog(file_path)¶

Class to manage log output file and write information to it

Tasks: Create file, write application version information. Download and replacement status. Database setup script used and time for each activity

time_it()¶

write_artifact_info(download_path)¶

Write information related to every artifacts. Such as folder size, number of files along with the download and replacement status of each artifact to file

Parameters:download_path (str) – root path of downloaded artifacts
write_database_info(script_name)¶

Write database script information to file

Parameters:script_name (str) – name of the db script
write_deployment_status(app_details=None)¶

Write deployment status of each artifact to file

Parameters:app_details (dict) – details of all artifacts that has been downloaded
